snippet.title: Slitterhead - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the Slitterhead gameplay trailer for an unsettling look at Bokeh Game Studio’s upcoming horror game. From Silent Hill and Gravity Rush creator Keiichiro Toyama, Slitterhead is a third-person action horror game. Set in a city inspired by 1980s and ’90s Hong Kong, it’ll have players battling mysterious creatures that can mimic humans. 

The Slitterhead release date is November 8, 2024 for PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, PS4 (PlayStation 4), and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

#IGN #Gaming #Slitterhead
